short_summary: Trimble T100 Tablet for Parks Canada
description: Parks Canada is requiring 6 of the Trimble T100 or equivalent for a project. This device specifically for its ability to function with the remainder of the family of Trimble Geospatial surveying products with its EMPOWER module for connectivity with optical instruments. Additional to the hardware factors involved, a huge component for this request is access to the Trimble suite of software tools as well that can be used to coordinate workflows for surveying.
duration_in_months: It is a a one-time sale with 30 days rigid deadline ...
